document.discussion_title: Hartford police investigate death of 3-month-old - WFSB 3 Connecticut
document.topic_text: Hartford police investigate death of 3-month-old - WFSB 3 Connecticut Member Center: Hartford police investigate death of 3-month-old Posted: Hartford police are investigating the death of a 3-month-old child. The parents of the child found the baby unresponsive early Thursday morning and called 911. The baby was taken to Connecticut Children’s Medical Center and was pronounced deceased a short time later. Police said there was no visible trauma to the child. The Hartford police Major Crimes Division & Special Investigative Division is actively investigating the case. The cause of death will be determined by the Medical Examiner. Copyright 2016 WFSB (Meredith Corporation). All rights reserved. Most Popular Stories Most Popular Stories More>>
